body: oh, strange... I will look into it as well.
I think i may find the root cause.

are you consume formate like this?

`{formState.isSubmitting}` and it's inside the render?

repository.name: react-hook-form
repository.description: ðŸ“‹ React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)

body:
Precisely!
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12937160/92248256-c5437f80-ee9e-11ea-8a63-016aaa46b7d6.png)

Thanks a lot for looking into this so quickly. It's working like a charm.
:)

In my case this is still not fixed, I upgraded from 6.3.3 to 6.7.2 and isSubmitting is still true, can confirm latest working version is 6.4.1.

Here's the [sandbox](https://codesandbox.io/s/proud-currying-w5n00?file=/src/form.tsx) displaying the issue, isSubmitting remains true after a reset. You can change the sandbox version to 6.4.1 and see it works as expected.

I think I've found the issue, it seems that here: https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/blob/88d454f820e1f1baef77d7166127ccc600bebd91/src/useForm.ts#L162-L170

formStateRef.current still holds isSubmitting = true, and since here https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/blob/88d454f820e1f1baef77d7166127ccc600bebd91/src/useForm.ts#L1101-L1110 we're not passing isSubmitting = false the one set wins when both are merged, leaving a false isSubmitting = true hanging out.

issue.title: fix reset updateFormState replacing isSubmitting

repository.name: react-hook-form
repository.description: ðŸ“‹ React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)

issue.body:
Fixes a variant of #2812 when reset gets called before onSubmit finishes.

In this case the proposed solution is for reset to not replace the isSubmitting property, so only handleSubmit controller is the one that manipulates isSubmitting.

body: @bluebill1049 I've submitted #2830 with my proposed solution for this, feel free to take a look.
Hi @bluebill1049 , in which version will this fix be released? In 6.7.2 the problem still occurs...

will release the fix this weekend or even earlier.
